useCase.name: Retrieve Local Justice Areas and Courts
useCase.description: As an Inputter, I want to retrieve Local Justice Areas and Courts information to populate the respective auto-complete fields.

preconditions.precondition: The user is logged in and has navigated to the Account Details page.

successEndConditions.condition: The user successfully retrieved Local Justice Areas and Courts information.

failureEndConditions.condition: The user encountered an error while retrieving Local Justice Areas and Courts information.

useCase.trigger: User clicks the Court Details link in the Account Details page.

mainSequence.step: User navigates to Court Details page
Retrieve Local Justice Areas records from Fines Database (JPA)
Local Justice Areas records are retrieved
Populate Local Justice Areas auto-complete field
Retrieve Courts records from Fines Database (JPA)
User enters Court details and clicks Return to Account Details
User navigates back to Account Details page
